name: Universal Exposition Brussels 1910
obverse_inscriptions: ROYAUME DE BELGIQUE·EXPOSITION UNIVERSELLE DE BRUXELLES·1910·
reverse: A man brings a vase up a staircase to a woman wearing a robe and holding a palm branch. The woman presents the man with a laurel crown.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the universal exhibition held in Brussels, Belgium in 1910.
